title: Ticket #2244: D_COMMAND logging should include hostname of denied/failed attempts
description:
you'll see a message like this, which tells you nothing about who originated the failed attempt: 
04/18 14:55:36 Calling Handler <DaemonCore::HandleReqSocketHandler> (2)
04/18 14:55:36 AUTHENTICATE: no available authentication methods succeeded, failing!
04/18 14:55:36 DC_AUTHENTICATE: authenticate failed: AUTHENTICATE:1003:Failed to authenticate with any method|AUTHENTICATE:1004:Failed to authenticate using PASSWORD
04/18 14:55:36 Return from Handler <DaemonCore::HandleReqSocketHandler>
creator: zmiller
